alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Alachua and west central Putnam Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hollister to near Alachua. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Interlachen, Melrose, Alachua, Hawthorne, Archer, University Of Florida, Rochelle, Melrose Landing and Orange Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Putnam
